com.myronmarston.util
Class FileHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.util.FileHelper

public class FileHelper
extends java.lang.Object

A class that provides static methods to manage temporary file resources.

Method Detail

createAndUseTempFile

public static void createAndUseTempFile(java.lang.String tempFilePrefix,
                                        java.lang.String tempFileSuffix,
                                        FileHelper.TempFileUser tempFileUser)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
Creates a temporary file, and allows a TempFileUser to use it. When it is complete, the file is deleted.

Parameters:
tempFilePrefix - the temp file prefix
tempFileSuffix - the temp file suffix
tempFileUser - the object that will use the temp file
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs

createAndUseFileBufferedWriter

public static void createAndUseFileBufferedWriter(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                  FileHelper.BufferedWriterUser bufferedWriterUser)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
Creates a buffered writer to write to a file using UTF-8 encoding and allows a BufferedWriterUser to use it. When it is complete, the buffered writer is flushed and all the consumed resources are released.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file
bufferedWriterUser - the object that will use the buffered writer
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

createTextFile

public static void createTextFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                  java.lang.String fileContents)
                           throws java.io.IOException
Creates a text file, using UTF-8 encoding.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the text file
fileContents - the text contents to put in the text file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an I/O error

readFileIntoString

                                           throws java.io.IOException
Reads the contents of a file into a string using UTF-8 encoding.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file
Returns:
the string contents of the file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

deleteNewTransientFiles

public static void deleteNewTransientFiles(java.io.File directory,
                                           java.io.FileFilter transientFileFilter,
                                           FileHelper.TransientFileUser transientFileUser)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
Manages the deletion of transient files--i.e. files created by some external process that are no longer needed and can be deleted. The transientFileFilter determines what qualifies as a transient file. Any existing files the match this filter will be kept; any files that are created by the transientFileUser.doWork() method that match the filter will be deleted.

Parameters:
directory - the directory in which the transient files will be created
transientFileFilter - filter that determines what is a transient file
transientFileUser - object containing a doWork() method that might create some transient files
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs

getTempDirectory

public static java.io.File getTempDirectory()
                                     throws java.io.IOException
Gets the temporary directory used on this system.

Returns:
the temp directory
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurred while getting the temp directory

stripFileExtension

public static java.lang.String stripFileExtension(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                  java.lang.String expectedFileExtension)
                                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Returns the file name without the extension. If the file does not have the expected extension, throws an IllegalArgumentException.

Parameters:
fileName - the file name
expectedFileExtension - the expected extension
Returns:
the file name without the extension
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file name does not have the extension

fileExists

public static boolean fileExists(java.lang.String fileName)
Checks to see if the given file exists.

Parameters:
fileName - the file name to check
Returns:
true if it exists; false if it does not or is a directory rather than a file
